_comments.fast_path_enabled: v5.1.0: Enable fast path validation for 70-80% performance improvement (default: true)
_comments.fast_path_validators: v5.1.0: List of fast path validators to use (current_directory, safe_extension, non_system_path)
_comments.max_bash_commands: 0 = unlimited, >0 = max bash commands per session (default: 5)
_comments.strict_mode: true = all warnings become blocks (fail-closed on ambiguity)
_comments.block_on_violation: true = any violation is immediately blocked (most restrictive)
_comments.email_alerts.priority_threshold: Minimum priority to send email: LOW, NORMAL, HIGH, CRITICAL (default: HIGH)
_comments.email_alerts.smtp_port: SMTP port (587 for TLS, 465 for SSL)
_comments.email_alerts.to_address: Email address to send alerts to
